resources.string: Must be a date after or equal to: %s!
Must be a date before or equal to: %s!
Must be a date between: %1$s and %2$s!
Must be a time after or equal to: %s!
Must be a time before or equal to: %s!
Must be a time between: %1$s and %2$s!
Value must be greater than or equal to %d!
Value must be lesser than or equal to %d!
Must be a decimal between: %1$d and %2$d!
